price: 69. Ma idinkaa kuwa ka soo dejiya daruura- ha, mise Annaga weeye kuwa soo dejiya?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
